1.title: 1. Vision and inspiration
1.description: You share your ideas with us. We help clarify your goals and even send a free draft so you know what to expect.

2.title: 2. Planning and structure
2.description: Together we define the layout, features, and visual style. You can browse inspirational examples if you like.

3.title: 3. Quote and timeline
3.description: Based on the draft, you receive a transparent quote. We set the project schedule, and if all’s good, we begin.

4.title: 4. Development and feedback
4.description: We build the site step by step. You stay involved throughout, ensuring everything aligns with your vision.

5.title: 5. Testing and delivery
5.description: Before handing over, we test thoroughly: speed, security, appearance — everything is in place.

6.title: 6. Payment and domain
6.description: Once approved, payment is made and you receive the finished site on your own domain.
